name: Galaxy Casino Live - Slots
description:
Everything in the world of casino, available at my fingertips to play free of charge

▶ Game characteristics ◀
Enjoy luxurious casino games from the most prestigious hotels in a single application!

▶Video Bingo
- Four maximum tickets per time increases winning possibility.
- Enjoy various winning patterns and wild balls!

▶ Completely lively gaming! Bonus chips every hour, and daily bonuses!
- Daily bonuses are paid out every day! Half-priced chip packs and various other benefits are waiting for you in Casino Live.
- Become a VIP at Casino Live! More benefits will be available.

▶ Slots
- Enjoy more than 40 slot themes and various casino games!
- Anyone can be a jackpot winner! Don't miss the chance to win a jackpot!

▶ Hold'em poker

- 5-player rooms and various buy-in tables provided. Optimal conditions to become a true poker master.

▶ Video poker
- A wide variety of video poker game modes! Jacks or Better! Jokers Wild! Deuces Wild!
- Enjoy fast game play using Multi-hand mode.

▶ BlackJack & Baccarat
- Realistic BlackJack and Baccarat play with 6-deck cards!
- The 6-deck card system used in real-life hotel casinos allows for even more realistic BlackJack and Baccarat play.

▶ Roulette & Keno
- Authentic American 38-slot roulette and simple but addictive Keno for everyone!

Fan page: http://facebook.com/CasinoLiveGame
